mapper.update:
update t_cooperation_debt
organ_id = #{organ_id}, yearmonth=#{yearmonth}, cooperationname=#{cooperationname}, organcode=#{organcode}, recorder=#{recorder}, recordtime=#{recordtime},
accountspayable=#{accountspayable}, assetall=#{assetall}, bankloan=#{bankloan}, buildingproject=#{buildingproject}, businessprofit=#{businessprofit}, capitalreserve=#{capitalreserve}, cashcapital=#{cashcapital}, depositreceived=#{depositreceived}, deprecication=#{deprecication}, financialcost=#{financialcost}, fixedasset=#{fixedasset}, fixedassetall=#{fixedassetall}, floatasset=#{floatasset}, floatassetall=#{floatassetall}, floatdebt=#{floatdebt}, floatdebtall=#{floatdebtall}, handingcost=#{handingcost}, interestexpense=#{interestexpense}, inventory=#{inventory}, investincome=#{investincome}, invisibleasset=#{invisibleasset}, longdebtall=#{longdebtall}, netprofit=#{netprofit}, netvalue=#{netvalue}, paidaddedtax=#{paidaddedtax}, payableaddedtax=#{payableaddedtax}, payableincometax=#{payableincometax}, prepayment=#{prepayment}, profitloss=#{profitloss}, realcapital=#{realcapital}, receivables=#{receivables}, registercapital=#{registercapital}, shortinvest=#{shortinvest}, shortloan=#{shortloan}, subsidyincome=#{subsidyincome}, surplusreserve=#{surplusreserve}, totalequity=#{totalequity}, totalequity1=#{totalequity1}, totalprofit=#{totalprofit}, unallotprofit=#{unallotprofit}, unbusinessexpense=#{unbusinessexpense}, unbusinessincome=#{unbusinessincome}, unpaidtax=#{unpaidtax},
accountspayable2=#{accountspayable2}, assetall2=#{assetall2}, bankloan2=#{bankloan2}, buildingproject2=#{buildingproject2}, businessprofit2=#{businessprofit2}, capitalreserve2=#{capitalreserve2}, cashcapital2=#{cashcapital2}, depositreceived2=#{depositreceived2}, deprecication2=#{deprecication2}, financialcost2=#{financialcost2}, fixedasset2=#{fixedasset2}, fixedassetall2=#{fixedassetall2}, floatasset2=#{floatasset2}, floatassetall2=#{floatassetall2}, floatdebt2=#{floatdebt2}, floatdebtall2=#{floatdebtall2}, handingcost2=#{handingcost2}, interestexpense2=#{interestexpense2}, inventory2=#{inventory2}, investincome2=#{investincome2}, invisibleasset2=#{invisibleasset2}, longdebtall2=#{longdebtall2}, netprofit2=#{netprofit2}, netvalue2=#{netvalue2}, paidaddedtax2=#{paidaddedtax2}, payableaddedtax2=#{payableaddedtax2}, payableincometax2=#{payableincometax2}, prepayment2=#{prepayment2}, profitloss2=#{profitloss2}, realcapital2=#{realcapital2}, receivables2=#{receivables2}, registercapital2=#{registercapital2}, shortinvest2=#{shortinvest2}, shortloan2=#{shortloan2}, subsidyincome2=#{subsidyincome2}, surplusreserve2=#{surplusreserve2}, totalequity2=#{totalequity2}, totalequity12=#{totalequity12}, totalprofit2=#{totalprofit2}, unallotprofit2=#{unallotprofit2}, unbusinessexpense2=#{unbusinessexpense2}, unbusinessincome2=#{unbusinessincome2}, unpaidtax2=#{unpaidtax2},
where debtid=#{debtid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.* FROM t_cooperation_debt t, (select debtid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as rn from t_cooperation_debt) AS t1 where t1.debtid= t.debtid
and t.recorder like '%${recorder}%'
and t.organ_id = '${organ_id}'
and t.cooperationname like '%${cooperationname}%'
and t.organcode like '%${organcode}%'
and t.recordtime >=to_date('${recordTimeBegin}','yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.recordtime <=to_date('${recordTimeEnd}','yyyy-mm-dd')
and t1.rn > #{start}
and t1.rn <= #{end}
order by ${sortField} ${sortOrder}
order by t.debtid desc

select count(*) from t_cooperation_debt t where 1=1
and t.recorder like '%${recorder}%'
and t.cooperationname like '%${cooperationname}%'
and t.organ_id = '${organ_id}'
and t.organcode like '%${organcode}%'
and t.recordtime >=to_date('${recordTimeBegin}','yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.recordtime <=to_date('${recordTimeEnd}','yyyy-mm-dd')
select debtid from t_cooperation_debt t where 1=1 and t.organ_id = '${organ_id}' and t.organcode = '${organcode}' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
